description: The government shutdown has forced hundreds of thousands of government employees to stop working. But what about all the people who rely on government contracts to get paid? Electric car maker Tesla saw a drop in its shares yesterday after a video of one of its cars that caught on fire went viral. And a look at how the health care overhaul will impact the Hispanic community.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 3, 2013
byline: Dan Weissmann, Stephen Keppel, Cintra Wilson, Mark Garrison, David Gura, Bruce Johnson and Diane Swonk
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 3, 2013
teaser: The government shutdown has forced hundreds of thousands of government employees to stop working. But what about all the people who rely on government contracts to get paid? And a look at how the health care overhaul will impact the Hispanic community.
